gameDetails.name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small â€“ More Buildings Big and Small
gameDetails.description: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small - More Buildings Big and Small, an expansion for the standalone two-player game Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small, adds 27 new special buildings to the base game as well as a fifth Stall tile and a farm expansion. These tiles offer players new ways to keep and breed animals, and allow them to expand their farms in interesting and innovative ways.
